resources.string: Internet connection is not found. Please try again.
Session expired. Please log in again.
Connection error. Please try again later.
Connection timed out. Please try again later.
Login required to perform current request. Please login.
Request entry too long. Please consult your service provider.
Server is not responding. Please contact your service provider.
There has been a server error. Please try again or consult your service provider.
There has been an error while processing your request. Please try again.
Unable to find the host. Please try changing the URL.
Error connecting to server. Connection to the server has failed.
There has been a server error. Received invalid response from server.
